alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 10:04PM EDT until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony. .Runoff from recent heavy rainfall will cause a prolonged and steady rise on the Wabash River at New Harmony with flooding expected to begin Friday morning. For the Wabash River...including New Harmony...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...From Friday morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 14.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday morning and continue rising to a crest of 17.2 feet next Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
